Text:
This is a sheet music tab. It has the fret numbers, and is positioned like regular tabs you'd find online, but it is formatted like regular sheet music. It has the time signature as well (4/4), so if you can read a little sheet music, you can get an idea of how fast to play it. 
This is a clean, clear, easy to read PDF file
Have fun with the song!

Nice! I was looking for music like this for canon rock! I hate searching all over for it, and realizing that it's not it, or they want me to do stupid surveys. Great find!
IT looks like sheet music, and tab! Perfect!

http://www.guitarprotabs.org/artist/tabs/Jerry_C/page1.php For the song.

You can find Guitar Pro here on TPB.

Here's the backing track for this song.  A must have for learning this.
